duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales and provide exceptional customer service in a retail environment focused on wireless, home services, and business sales.
Stay informed about the latest technology and devices to be a knowledgeable consultant for customers.
Work full-time with rotating shifts, including evenings and Saturdays, to meet sales goals.
Lift materials weighing up to 40 lbs, stand for long periods, and use computer keyboard and mouse for extended periods.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or equivalent, or one year of customer service or sales experience
